Title: Relates to health insurance and provider divestment
Summary: Provides that it is unlawful for any person to directly or indirectly own, operate, or control the whole or any part of a health insurance company and a health care provider; requires divestment within three years.
LawCode: Add ยง5-339, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to health insurance and provider divestment
